biotools.summary: This package makes use of STAMP for comparing a set of motifs to a given database (e.g. JASPAR). It can also be used to visualize motifs, motif distributions, modules and filter motifs.

bioschemas.name: MotIV
bioschemas.summary: This package makes use of STAMP for comparing a set of motifs to a given database (e.g. JASPAR). It can also be used to visualize motifs, motif distributions, modules and filter motifs.
